definition: to drip into/to transfuse/to percolate/to drip feed/fig. to instill
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Objective To observe the role of aspisol in the children's febrile disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察靜脈滴注來比林在兒童發熱性疾病中的作用。

sentences.english: The low-dosage insulin was effective to children with DKA.
sentences.chinese: 小劑量胰島素短時靜脈滴注治療DKA效果好。

sentences.english: Results The drip-type enema retention enema treatment more effective than proctitis.
sentences.chinese: 結果滴注式灌腸治療直腸炎效果優於保留灌腸。

sentences.english: Intravenous drip treatment applications without Ukrainian Central glycosides .
sentences.chinese: 治療應用時靜脈滴注無環烏苷。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effect of intravenous drip in small transfusion bottle replacing intravenous injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小密封瓶靜脈滴注替代靜脈推注給藥的效果。

sentences.english: Therapy should consist of intravenous infusion of warm isotonic saline.
sentences.chinese: 治療應包括溫生理鹽水靜脈滴注。

sentences.english: Results Establish an extraction methods of Shuanghuanglian Injection.
sentences.chinese: 結果確定雙黃連滴注液最佳提取工藝。

sentences.english: Intravenous pain medications can be given when nausea and vomiting are present.
sentences.chinese: 若伴有有噁心嘔吐症狀，可以靜脈滴注止痛藥物。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the drip-style enema role in the treatment of chronic proctitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討滴注式灌腸治療慢性直腸炎的作用。

sentences.english: The main administration route was intravenous drip.
sentences.chinese: 給藥途徑主要爲靜脈滴注。

sentences.english: In some cases, feeding via an intravenous drip may be necessary.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，經一飼靜脈滴注可能是必要的。

sentences.english: Intravenous drip urography of large dose was more effective.
sentences.chinese: 大劑量靜脈滴注尿路造影效果更好。

sentences.english: Methods Change the traditional retention enema, using a direct infusion infusion enema.
sentences.chinese: 方法改變傳統的保留灌腸，採用輸液器直接滴注灌腸。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of instillation of sacral canal for the treatment of lumbar disc herniation.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察骶管滴注治療腰椎間盤突出症的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effectiveness of hot compress on the polarized liquid intravenous infusion-induced pain.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察熱敷法對靜脈滴注極化液所致疼痛的療效。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
